attributes.background: Hospital has been open for decades and is convenient for local OAP’s to have blood tests. The minor injuries unit takes some pressure off of Basildon A+E.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This decision was made by the local clinical commissioning group, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out how to contact them here: http://www.nhsmidandsouthessex.co.uk/contact-us/
